message.body: Are you familiar with the Frying Pan area of Virginia?
Ok. Figured it'd be a long shot. It's a lil west of DC (Fairfax) so I figured I'd at least ask.
Hm, I'm familiar with Fairfax, just not that name. Say, you wouldn't happen to have a spare complete board lying around, would you?
I do. It's pretty shitty tho.
Haha,.. How shitty? Is it like a world industries or something? I left my board at my brother's and my friend is coming down to skate today.. Super bummed
I don't remember what it is. It's just been sitting in my basement. I'm in Virginia tho so wouldn't be able to get it till this evening. Yr welcome to borrow it tho.
Ah, okay. I appreciate it. I'll let you know if the itch to shred gets bad enough
